title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
description: Built enterprise-scale web applications for one of the largest agricultural companies in the world. Ongoing projects include a cross-platform UI library and a cross-platform, greenfield FinTech app, among others. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions that exceeded client needs.

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
description: Developed on a wide range of projects, delivering scalable solutions across industries, with a focus on accessibility within enterprise-scale web applications. Worked closely with clients to understand their requirements and deliver high-quality, accessible solutions.

title: Full-Stack Engineer Apprenticeship
description: Created and deployed mobile-first applications while honing technical skills by collaborating with other developers. Gained hands-on experience with modern web development technologies and methodologies.

title: Architect
description: Led operations on a variety of project types, including a minor league baseball stadium and a large apartment complex. Managed projects from design through construction.

title: Project Architect
description: Managed multi-family and interiors projects, including budgeting, scheduling, proposal preparation, exterior design, construction document management, client presentations, consultant coordination, and construction administration.
